verses.roman:
rātri-dina kare teṅho nāma-saṅkīrtana
kṣaṇa-mātra nāhi chāḍe prabhura caraṇa

synonyms: rātri-dina—all day and night; kare—performs; teṅho—he; nāma-saṅkīrtana—chanting of the Hare Kṛṣṇa mantra; kṣaṇa-mātra—even for a moment; nāhi chāḍe—does not give up; prabhura caraṇa—the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: "He chants the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra all day and night. He never gives up the shelter of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, not even for a moment.
